titles.title: When I'm In The Spirit, I Am The Voice Of God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When I'm in the spirit I am the voice of God,
When I'm in the spirit heaven's courts are trod,
When I'm in the spirit the city I can see,
When I'm in the spirit He's glorified in me,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord, help me walk in the spirit,
Lord, help me talk in the spirit,
Lord, help me live in the spirit,
In that city that was built for me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When I'm in the spirit I'm in the corporate man,
When I'm in the spirit I'm God's redemptive plan,
When I'm in the spirit I'm a child of liberty,
When I'm in the spirit I'll set creation free.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
When I'm in the spirit no enemy prevails,
When I'm in the spirit I see right through the veil,
When I'm in the spirit His purpose I fulfil,
When I'm in the spirit I'll do His perfect will,
